# bundle

**Instance Property**

A reference to the bundle used for storing the downloaded resources. (read-only)

## Declaration

```swift
var bundle: Bundle { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is either the main bundle or the one specified in the call to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSBundleResourceRequest/init(tags:bundle:)]. It is valid as soon as the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSBundleResourceRequest] object is created.

## Accessing the Configuration

- **tags**: A set of strings, with each string specifying a tag used to mark on-demand resources managed by the request. (read-only)
